name: Slime Buster (MouriDev)
description:
You are a Slime Buster. Your Job is to defeat slime as many that you can!!  

Slime Buster is a game about shooting slime. Fight off the slime to survive, this game is endless and have fun :D

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • 1, 2, 3 - Change Weapon
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Escape - Pause Menu
